name: CAMBRAY CORGI
description:
The Cambray Glenumbran Corgi is a hardy working Dog from High Rock, renowned for its intelligence and natural herding abilities. It is one of two breeds known as Glenumbran Corgis, the other being the Daenia Glenumbran Corgi.

Known for their fierce loyalty and friendly demeanor, the Cambray Corgi is favored by farmers throughout High Rock. Their stocky build and short stature that make them perfect for driving livestock through the province's rocky lowlands.
